thread.title: Comment on Kings’ TV Announcer is Enjoying Lexington by Bluegrass_ent
thread.title_full: Comment on Kings’ TV Announcer is Enjoying Lexington by Bluegrass_ent

author: Bluegrass_ent
title: Comment on Kings’ TV Announcer is Enjoying Lexington by Bluegrass_ent
text:
Posted in Basketball , Main | 1 Response (CBS Sacramento) 
Grant Napear, the voice of the Kings and the host of his self-titled show, has been taking in all of LEX this weekend on his team’s trip . Napear was on the sideline for the UK/Auburn game, at Keeneland, and touring the basketball facilities in Rupp. It’s always nice to see the city of Lexington make such a strong first impression on our visitors. Check out some of his pics and experiences on Twitter. Great day at Keeneland…home of this year's Breeders' Cup! pic.twitter.com/kL8LMlJ6Vb 
— Grant Napear (@GrantNapearshow) October 16, 2015 The scene in front of Rupp Arena 3 hours before Kings-Pelicans. Amazing!!! #SacramentoProud pic.twitter.com/ujmxivXGJZ 
— Grant Napear (@GrantNapearshow) October 17, 2015 Great atmosphere here for Kentucky-Auburn! pic.twitter.com/998haKriLN
